lines.text: Have you heard the word of God? It's the greatest gift of all time. You have to trust completely in God. He'll forgive you of all your sins.
Who forgives God?
Sharon, it's just a drug. You're in pain. Instead of doing heroin, you're doing God.

[to Louis, who holds a gun]
I have a little girl.
So what?
[Louis shoots him]
No... I miss my daddy!
Oh, honey, I miss your daddy too.
I want to go to heaven so I can see him again.

Sharon, don't you understand what's going on? The world's a disaster. We have no power to make it better. You hate your job; you hate your life; but you want to feel special. Instead of letting me do that, you're rushing off to something that's not even there.
There has to be something more.
Why?
I'm tired of all the pain in my life. I'm tired of feeling empty all the time.
You fell in love!
Yes.
Wait 'til he finds out about you.
Oh, he knows all about me.
Is he as bad a boy as I am?
I think you should meet him.
You told him about me?
I told you. He knows everything.
He's rich, right? He's some rich guy and you fell for some line of his.
You could love him too, Vic.
You fell for some rich homosexual!
[Vic doubles up laughing]
He's the Lord Jesus Christ, Vic. He's the Son of God.
Have you been saved?
No.
Do you know what that means?
Yeah.
Would you like to be?
Oh, yeah, yeah, sure, who wouldn't?
[first lines]
Please hold for the number. Operator 134. What city please? Is that a business or residence?
[last lines]
Forever.
